page.title: 06STUBBERS: UPMINSTER
page.content: { {Stubbers}is an outdoor pursuits centre. I have been going to Stubbers for five years. A lot has happened since then. A new lake has been opened and the previous lake is being made smaller. Most of the canoeist use the larger lakes but the{canoeing}pond is occasionally used for instruction. It's great fun down at Stubbers especially in the summer holidays when courses are being held. Plenty is going on all the year round there is never a dull moment. In my view the best actvity available at Stubbers is{camping althougth{sailing}comes a close second. Camping over the weekend when a lot of other people are camping as well can be great fun especially after night fall. Andrew Thompson
